Containers.Name: Speedtest
Containers.Description: Automatically execute speedtest.net tests[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] You [span style='color: #E80000;']must[/span] set the correct envionment variables for the container. Click on "Advanced view" in the top right and fill in the filelds[br] - ACCESS_KEY - your AWS access key[br] - SECRET_KEY - your AWS secret key[br] - EMAIL - The email address to send the report, eg. name@host.com[br] - SERVER - The mail server to be used to send notifications - PORT - The server port (25, 467, 587) - ROUTER - Mikrotik router IP address - CRON_SCHEDULE - Customize how often the speedtest is executed (default: hourly), "0 3 0 0 0" for once every night[br][br]
